    When executed, all the enemies and items that are resettable will be reset.
    String

    When executed, the player's runes will be added capability of RESTING before resetting the game.
    String
    SellAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    When executed, this sellable item will be removed from player's inventory and corresponding runes amount will be added to player's runes amount.
